abstract: An inconvenient physicist takes away a persistent talking point of climate skeptics.
snippet: An inconvenient physicist takes away a persistent talking point of climate skeptics.
lead_paragraph: 10:45 p.m. | Updated Anthony Watts and others who have energized climate skeptics by claiming to poke holes in research showing substantial recent warming have their work cut out for them.

headline.main: Skeptic Talking Point Melts Away as an Inconvenient Physicist Confirms Warming
